text:
The german translation for validation of valid document id's contains " in the
translated string which causes javascript to complain.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 15069
Patch for src/webapp/lenya/resources/i18n/cmsui_de.xml

Replaces " with '.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 35022 ***
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
